sentence: Gym was well equipped for a 2hr workout
breakfast happy hour gym biz center

the well appointed kitchenette and bathroom felt like a NY studio apartment windows that open so you can have fresh air and turn off the aircon desk with good light good in room safe iron and ironing board the friendly and helpful staff ask them anything and they will try and help although the counter staff were more helpful than the concierge the business area where you can print out your tickets and boarding passes complimentary breakfasts cereal bagels yoghurt waffles or pancakes ham and egg wraps tea coffee juice fruit complimentary week night evening receptions with decent snacks and beer and wine and soft drinks complimentary coffee and tea all day in the foyer laundry and gym in the basement option to trade daily room servicing for credit or hotel points free wi fi and cable internet use the cable if you need a reliable connection as the wi fi does drop in and out baggage storage before checkin and after checkout

I had a very pleasant stay and found the hotel rather charming and a good value because you save a lot of money with free breakfast wine snacks coffee gym wifi its all inclusive at the element time square
Great hotel close to all of Times Square and activities
If you like exercise you can easily walk to Central Park and take in the city sights

kitchenette good if you want to cook anything free breakfast but see below free wifi that was pretty fast and very good gym on the bottom floor just make sure you put the air con onThe negatives breakfast pretty basic but impossible to get a seat
Good size gym
Gym was an extra bonus
Large gym with plenty of treadmills some nautilus machines and free weights
I saw the gym in the basement but did not use it walking the city was enough exercise

The gym was clean and had enough equipment for me to kid myself on that I was going to get lean again on at least two occasions I visited the roof top terrace once the views are nice but with the wind chill it felt like 25 so I did n’t hang about
Gym was good but again no TV service
Appeared to be some sort of addict activity
Sketchy activity on corner one morning

having stayed here many times i keep coming back like a person in a bad relatioship who thinks things will improve only to find that not much as changed despite assurances to the contraryon this occasion the elevators ran slower than italian trains which other reviewers have noted the internet was intermittent the sensor to the gym did not work despite having keys rekeyed twice and handles in both the shower and faucets were broken and nearly came off when puledwith the merger with Mariot which occurred during my stay and prevented me from adjusting my reservation i am afraid that others will opt for other properties in the Mariot SPG portfolio which would be a shamethe staff was overall very helpful so not an indictment on them at all
The Elevators are scarily unreliable you must add at least 30 minutes to your daily activities esp appointments
Good exercise for me but would not be good if you had mobility issues or heavy cases
19 floors of stairs is great cardio but is not fun
Self service laundry coin operated and gym
